data.text: @indagroovebc @CPHO_Canada It’s only illegal for a health professionals or a health institution to leak personal information. It’s not illegal for companies and employers and schools etc to request/require vaccination status. Show me in your charter where it claims no one can require it.

@CPHO_Canada @GovCanHealth Why health officials and government officials are lying about the actual situation of pandemic in Canada to Canadians. We are do have the freedom and rights to know the actual number of infected covid19 people and where are the hot zones for prevention. Check Hong Kong crisis
@CPHO_Canada This is good news. Why are you still scaring people?
@CPHO_Canada @GovCanHealth But we still have mandates in place for NO reason. None
@postocron @logosaetos @Lizzy_Lang7 @CPHO_Canada Sonia that a “None” or a “I can’t provide anything to back my claim” or both?
@postocron @Lizzy_Lang7 @logosaetos @CPHO_Canada You made the claim.  The burden of proof is on you, not her.
@CPHO_Canada Ya...so drop the bs mandates...wtf you waitin for

@logosaetos @CPHO_Canada @GovCanHealth Many people are nervous about the MRNA vaccines, due to the side effects.  The govt has been pushing Pfizer and Moderna, and has been slow to approve other types of vaccines.  
I'm sure some un-vaccinated Canadians may have preferred a choice of another type of vaccine.
